info.title: VirtualWANAsAServiceManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure VirtualWAN As a Service.

get.description: Lists all the P2SVpnGateways in a subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the P2SVpnGateways in the subscription.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualHubs in a subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualHubs in the subscription.

parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualWANs in the subscription.

get.description: Lists all the P2SVpnGateways in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the P2SVpnGateways in the resource group.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a virtual wan p2s vpn gateway.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan p2s vpn gateway retrieved.

put.description: Creates a virtual wan p2s vpn gateway if it doesn't exist else updates the existing gateway.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to create or Update a virtual wan p2s vpn gateway.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan p2s vpn Gateway created or updated.

201.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan p2s vpn gateway retrieved.

delete.description: Deletes a virtual wan p2s vpn gateway.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. P2SVpnGateway deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. P2SVpnGateway deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No p2s vpn gateways exist by the name provided.

patch.description: Updates virtual wan p2s vpn gateway tags.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to update a virtual wan p2s vpn gateway tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the updated gateway.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the updated gateway.

post.description: Generates VPN profile for P2S client of the P2SVpnGateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the generate P2SVpnGateway VPN client package operation.

200.description: VPN profile package URL.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Gets the connection health of P2S clients of the virtual wan P2SVpnGateway in the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the P2SVpnGateway.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: P2S Vpn Gateway with P2S connection health details.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

put.description: Creates a VirtualWAN resource if it doesn't exist else updates the existing VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being created or updated.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to create or update VirtualWAN.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN created or updated.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualWAN resource.

200.description: Request successful. VirtualWAN deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. VirtualWAN deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No VirtualWANs exist by the name provided.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN updated.

get.description: Gives the supported security providers for the virtual wan.

parameters.description: The resource group name.

parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN for which supported security providers are needed.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the object containing supported security providers.

post.description: Gives the sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to download vpn-sites configuration.

200.description: Request successful. Follow the location header for sas-url to output blob.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously. Follow the location header for sas-url to output blob.

DeviceProperties.description: List of properties of the device.

outputBlobSasUrl.description: The sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites.

vpnSites.description: List of resource-ids of the vpn-sites for which config is to be downloaded.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

allowHubToRemoteVnetTransit.description: VirtualHub to RemoteVnet transit to enabled or not.

allowRemoteVnetToUseHubVnetGateways.description: Allow RemoteVnet to use Virtual Hub's gateways.

HubVirtualNetworkConnectionStatus.description: The current state of the VirtualHub to vnet connection.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

ListHubVirtualNetworkConnectionsResult.description: List of HubVirtualNetworkConnections and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

ListP2SVpnGatewaysResult.description: Result of the request to list P2SVpnGateways. It contains a list of P2SVpnGateways and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.
